title: Honoring Loretta Sullivan on her retirement from the Goshen Central School District after 15 years of service as Secretary to the Principal of Goshen HS
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION honoring Loretta Sullivan on the occasion of her
retirement from the Goshen Central School District  after  15  years  of
distinguished service

WHEREAS,  New  York State's commitment to education is unparalleled; its
history and stature are secured by the superlative caliber of its educa-
tional professionals and the students and community they inspire; and
  WHEREAS, It is the practice of this Legislative Body to take  note  of
and publicly acknowledge individuals of remarkable integrity and charac-
ter whose endeavors have contributed to the quality of education in this
great State; and
  WHEREAS,  Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body  is  justly  proud  to  honor
Loretta  Sullivan  upon the occasion of her retirement after 15 years of
outstanding service to the Goshen Central School District  as  Secretary
to the Principal of Goshen High School; and
  WHEREAS,  The  result of many individual efforts, Loretta Sullivan has
contributed significantly to the excellence and success of  Goshen  High
School and the Goshen Central School District; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout her 15 year career, Loretta Sullivan has witnessed
the burgeoning of responsibilities and adapted herself to the continuing
technological  transformation  of  the operation and administration of a
school; and
  WHEREAS, She has welcomed each day as new and exciting, answering  the
busy  phone, serving as Secretary to Goshen High School's Principal, and
helping to manage the office; and
  WHEREAS, Grateful for the friends she has made and appreciative of the
lessons she has learned, Loretta Sullivan has demonstrated an impressive
dedication, an unparalleled devotion, and an unremitting enthusiasm  for
the  quality  of  the  educational programs and opportunities offered at
Goshen High School and by the Goshen Central  School  District  for  the
benefit  of their faculty and students, as well as for the entire Goshen
community; and
  WHEREAS, In completing her service  with  the  Goshen  Central  School
District,  Loretta  Sullivan  leaves behind more than bricks and mortar,
she leaves behind a legacy of warmth and compassion and of  service  and
commitment to the residents of the Goshen Central School District commu-
nity and to future generations of its students; and
  WHEREAS,  It is the sense of this Legislative Body to extend its high-
est commendation to her in recognition and appreciation of  her  commit-
ment,  dedication,  and 15 years of outstanding service; now, therefore,
be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor  Loretta  Sullivan upon the occasion of her retirement from Goshen
High School and the Goshen Central School District, to commend  her  for
her significant contributions to education in her community, and to wish
her well in her well-deserved retirement; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Loretta Sullivan.
